ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: * Carnage growled at herself for acting so sullen and depressed, this was no attitude for an assassin! She turned away from the water and Teltoli both at once

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
From: Carnage Dinobot <carnage@...>



* Carnage growled at herself for acting so sullen and depressed, this was no attitude for an assassin! She turned away from the water and Teltoli both at once with a loud snarl, she felt angry and silly both at the same time. Silly for acting so but angry that the memories just wouldn't leave her alone!
Carnage began to walk away from the lake clearing, not quite in the forest yet. She had a lot to think about but none of it to do with talking about her problems. But in a sense she didn't want to really be alone either. She stopped just before entering into the forest, not even looking back at Teltoli she said...*

" If you wanna come with me you're welcome, but I have no idea where I'm headed."

* She just wanted to walk and try to forget and cool off. But a friend by her side to seek with if she ever wanted to was a good idea to her at the time.*
